amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for Concurrent Technology Corporation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Center for Instrumented Critical Infrastructure in Pennsylvania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 326 (Roll no. 636).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Flake.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 326 (Roll no. 636).
